analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0x80647a3b0ea039dd077c10128558a948fc0d9276.sol:
	Contract SolarDaoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0x80647a3b0ea039dd077c10128558a948fc0d9276.sol#177-178)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in SolarDaoTokenCrowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/18/0x80647a3b0ea039dd077c10128558a948fc0d9276.sol#430-469):
